This Introductory Workshop, will focus on three: (1) problem solving, (2) critical analysis and (3) communication.

The Introductory Workshop also provides an overview of ethics in the accounting profession, a topic that will be discussed in detail on the day of the workshop and through your prework reading and exercises.
